=Introduction=


==No special methods==

This list shows the deploy classes that don't accept any particularly method, apart from the __construct() options. Check the available options [Zend_Config_Support at the Zend_Config page] 

 * Print
 * PDF
 * Word
 * Wordx
 * Excel
 * OFC (Open Flash Chart)
 * ODT (Open Document Format Text)
 * ODS (Open Document Format Spreadsheet)
 * Json
 * XML
